name: Rubek
description: Roll and match colors in this mind bending puzzle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: Very nice game, can be relaxfull and stressfull, we need more games like this on the market :)  Still, there some improvements thant can be made, especially on the ui.
